knimeNode.name: SSMD (PC x NC)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Calculates SSMDs for all combinations of a selection of negative and a selection of positive controls.

fullDescription.intro:
The output will be a new table that contains SSMDs per plate and selecteed readout for all combinations of a selection of negative and a selection of positive controls.
A more detailed introduction into SSMDs and the use of robust statistics can be found in "A New Method with Flexible and Balanced Control of False Negatives and False Positives for Hit Selection in RNA Interference High-Throughput Screening Assays, Zhang, 2007, Journal of Biomolecular Screening; 12; 645".
fullDescription.option: Allows to select the readouts for which z-primes will be calcuated
The reference sample that is used to calculate the normalization coefficients

ports.outPort: A table containg a row for each plate with all SSMDs as attributes.
